backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko backend actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two implemented features: the ZWEETI Pro visual theme update across App.tsx, BillingForm.tsx, BillSummary.tsx, and index.css, and the Download Bill button that generates zweeti-bill.txt.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file for the Zweeti Fast Food Billing app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads Nunito and Nunito Sans fonts from Google Fonts and mounts the React app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing customer name and bill items state, rendering the full billing UI with header, form, summary, Print Bill, Download Bill (downloads zweeti-bill.txt), and Clear All buttons.
frontend/src/components/BillingForm.tsx: Billing form component with a 13-item menu dropdown, quantity input, and an orange Add Item button styled with ZWEETI Pro orange accents and dashed borders.
frontend/src/components/BillSummary.tsx: Bill summary table component displaying items with orange header, dashed row borders, GST (5%) calculation, grand total in orange, and per-item remove buttons hidden on print.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) access and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind directives, ZWEETI Pro brand color variables (orange, green, blue), and reusable component classes for cards, buttons, tables, and print styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with ZWEETI brand colors, Nunito font, OKLCH CSS variable-based semantic color tokens, and plugins for animation, typography, and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the Zweeti Fast Food Billing app's architecture, existing features, known issues, and design reference details including the orange/green/blue color scheme and menu items.
